src:
Digratiskan Seminggu, Ini Tarif Tol Pandaan-Malang Seksi 4
03 Nov 2019, 04:52 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Foto: Istimewa

Jakarta - Tol Pandaan-Malang Seksi 4 Singosari-Pakis telah dibuka pada 1 November 2019 lalu. Selama seminggu, tol ini tidak dikenakan biaya alias gratis.Demikian disampaikan Badan Pengatur Jalan Tol (BPJT) Kementerian Pekerjaan Umum dan Perumahan Rakyat (PUPR) melalui laman resminya seperti dikutip detikcom, Minggu (3/11/2019)."Bertepatan awal dimulainya bulan November 2019, yakni pada tanggal 1 November 2019 pukul 06.00 WIB, Jalan Tol Pandaan-Malang Seksi 4 (Singosari-Pakis) sudah dibuka untuk umum dan tidak dikenakan tarif (Rp 0)," bunyi keterangan tersebut.Pengoperasian Tol Pandaan Malang Seksi 4 ini berdasarkan Keputusan Menteri Pekerjaan Umum dan Perumahan Rakyat Nomor: 1026/KPTS/M/2019, tentang Penetapan Pengoperasian Jalan Tol Pandaan Malang Seksi 4 (Singosari-Pakis). Setelah seminggu, atau tepatnya pada 7 November 2019 pukul 00.00 WIB tol ini akan berbayar.Berikut daftar tarif tol tersebut:Pakis-Singosari (Golongan I Rp 4.500)Pakis-Lawang (Golongan I Rp 10.500)Pakis-Purwodadi (Golongan I Rp 18.000)Pakis-Pandaan (Golongan I Rp 33.500)Patut diketahui, Tol Pandaan-Malang dikelola oleh Badan Usaha Jalan Tol (BUJT) PT Jasamarga Pandaan-Malang. Tol ini mempunyai total panjang 38,48 km yang terbagi menjadi 5 seksi. Kelima seksi itu yakni Seksi 1 Pandaan-Purwodadi (15,48Km), Seksi 2 Purwodadi-Lawang (8,5 Km), Seksi 3 Lawang-Singosari (7 Km), Seksi 4 Singosari-Pakis (4,7 Km) dan Seksi 5 Pakis-Malang (3,1 Km).Seksi 1 hingga 3 tol ini telah beroperasi terlebih dahulu. Sementara, Seksi 5 dalam tahap konstruksi di mana progresnya mencapai 76,9% pada 25 Oktober 2019. Simak Video "Heboh Barrier di Tol Pandaan-Malang Geser Sendiri ke Lajur Tengah"[Gambas:Video 20detik](dna/dna)
text:
For free a week, this is Section 4 of the Pandaan-Malang Toll Road
03 Nov 2019, 04:52 by Achmad Dwi Afriyadi


Photo: Special

Jakarta - Pandaan-Malang Toll Section 4 Singosari-Pakis was opened on 1 November 2019. For a week, the toll road is free of charge. As stated by the Toll Road Regulatory Agency (BPJT) of the Ministry of Public Works and Public Housing (PUPR) through its official website, as quoted by AFP on Sunday (3/11/2019). " November 2019, namely on November 1, 2019 at 06.00 West Indonesia Time, Pandaan-Malang Toll Road Section 4 (Singosari-Pakis) has been opened to the public and is not subject to a tariff (Rp. 0), "said the statement. based on the Decree of the Minister of Public Works and Public Housing Number: 1026 / KPTS / M / 2019, concerning Determination of Operation of Pandaan Malang Toll Road Section 4 (Singosari-Pakis). After a week, or precisely on November 7, 2019 at 00.00 WIB this toll road will pay. The following is the toll tariff list: Pakis-Singosari (Group I Rp. 4,500) Pakis-Lawang (Group I Rp. 10,500) Pakis-Purwodadi (Group I Rp. 18,000) Pakis-Pandaan (Group I Rp. 33,500) It is worth noting, Pandaan-Malang Toll Road is managed by PT Jasamarga Pandaan-Malang Toll Road Business Entity. This toll road has a total length of 38.48 km which is divided into 5 sections. The five sections are Section 1 Pandaan-Purwodadi (15.48 Km), Section 2 Purwodadi-Lawang (8.5 Km), Section 3 Lawang-Singosari (7 Km), Section 4 Singosari-Pakis (4.7 Km) and Section 5 Pakis-Malang (3.1 Km) .Section 1 to 3 of this toll road has been operating first. Meanwhile, Section 5 is under construction where the progress has reached 76.9% on October 25, 2019. See Video "Splashy Barrier in the Pandaan-Malang Toll Road to Move Alone to the Middle Lane" [Gambas: Video 20 seconds] (dna / dna)
